Overview:

A single source of truth for instant and accurate answers, anytime and anywhere.

Knowmax is a KM platform built to ensure you, your team, and your customers always have seamless knowledge experiences.

Whether you're looking for a knowledge hub to deliver complex knowledge in easy-to-consume formats or a second brain to preserve your employee's expertise, you can be assured of instant, and easy access to actionable knowledge, anytime and anywhere. 

With Knowmax's chrome extension, your teams can access all the information from your company's knowledge base right where they are. With no limit to the number of content pieces one can open, your team can support multiple customers concurrently without friction or distraction from toggling between screens. Your team can now be great conversationalists and confident problem solvers with the right knowledge a search away.

Here's how Knowmax's chrome extension works:

The Knowmax chrome extension brings information from your organization's KM platform into any tool or browser your team may use. With Knowmax's browser extension, your teams can access multiple content pieces simultaneously. All they will need to do is double-tap on the chrome extension widget on their browser and input relevant keywords for the content. 

Boost your team's productivity by minimizing the time and effort needed to search for the correct information. Elevate your agent experiences, and bring down call handling time by making your knowledge work for you, right where you are.  

Key features of Knowmax's chrome extension:
1X, 2X, or 3X screen sizes depending on your team's needs and preferences 
Easy drag option to position the widget anywhere on your screen 
Intuitive search to surface the relevant content instantly 
Chat-first to enable your team to support and converse with multiple customers
Open any content piece on a Chrome tab 

Steps to install the Knowmax chrome extension:

On the Chrome web store, search for Knowmax or click on this link directly.
Click on "Add to Chrome." 
A pop-up asking, "Add 'Knowmax?'" will appear. Click on "Add extension" to proceed.
Once the extension is downloaded, a notification confirms that Knowmax has been added to Chrome.
To add the extension to your toolbar, click the jigsaw puzzle icon. Select Knowmax and click on "Pin."
To proceed, click on the Knowmax extension symbolized as "K." It will ask for the API domain and API token.
Note: API Domain: gateway.knowmax.io
To get the API token, 
Kindly go to the Admin panel of the Knowmax platform and click on company settings.
Go to company settings, and copy the Integration token in the pop-up.
Paste this token in the "Add API token" section of the chrome extension and save.

About Knowmax:

Knowmax is a full-suite knowledge management platform built by CX experts to help you deliver top-grade customer service. Trusted by some Fortune 500 clients to meet their KM needs, Knowmax is a single source of truth to help you manage and share organizational knowledge effectively.

It is a no-code platform, so you can create content without requiring any technical expertise. The design of content modules is purpose-built to deliver complex knowledge in easily consumable formats like decision trees, picture guides, FAQs, and help articles. It also gives you insights into the average usage of content, user engagement patterns, top searched keywords, and time spent on each content piece.
